amendment.description: Amendment deletes $10 million in funding for the Animas-La Plata Bureau of Reclamation water project in southern Colorado and northern New Mexico.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce the funds appropriated in the bill for Bureau of Reclamation construction programs by $10 million. The intent of the amendment is to end funding for the Animas-La Plata irrigation project in Colorado and New Mexico.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Petri amendment (A008) Agreed to by recorded vote: 221 - 200 (Roll no. 354).
